DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , unblinded , prospective randomize control trial enroll adult diabetic patient Wilson Community Health Center , Harvest Family Health Center , Freedom Hill Community Health Center live 200 % 2013 poverty level serum hemoglobin A1C > 9 % currently mobile device text messaging capacity . After write informed consent obtain , subject randomize intervention control group ( 1:1 ) , stratify base insulin initiation within 1 week study inclusion . Participants randomized intervention group divide subgroup `` insulin user '' `` non-insulin user '' receive SMS message every 7 day . The content message consist medication reminder , report blood glucose result , insulin technique assessment ( applicable ) , ) medication adherence assessment . Participants ask respond simple text within 7 day . The intervention group receive standard medical appointment reminder via telephone one two business day prior appointment Health Center PLUS unidirectional text message two business day prior schedule health center appointment . Control group participant receive standard medical appointment reminder via telephone one two business day prior appointment health center . All participant study ( control intervention ) undergo venipuncture 3 month ( +/- ) 2 week determination hemoglobin A1C .
